resources.string: Follow these steps to setup the application if you don\'t redirected to \".statuses\" or \"GBWhatsApp_Statuses\" folder
Select \"Show hidden files\". Then click on \"Android\" folder
Select folder name for Whatsapp \"com.whatsapp\", for WhatsApp Business select \"com.whatsapp.w4b\" and for GBWhatsApp select \"com.gbwhatsapp\".
Then Select folder for Whatsapp \"WhatsApp\", for WhatsApp Business select \"WhatsApp Business\" and for GBWhatsApp select \"GBWhatsApp\"
Then Select folder for Whatsapp \".Statuses\", for WhatsApp Business select \".Statuses\" and for GBWhatsApp select \"GBWhatsApp_Statuses\"
